attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In light of recent events over the arrest of Damian Green. The Home Secretary should resign effective immediately. 
Damian Green was arrested over a leak from the Home Office about clearance of illegal immigrants to work as security staff, which he rightly made public knowledge. 
This is a clear attempt at stopping the government being held to account.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
